attributes.action: Make John Berkow a crossbench peer in the House of Lords, keep tradition alive!
attributes.additional_details: Please refer to Parliamentary and media evidence.
attributes.background: We, the U.K. public wish to preserve tradition and have the Speak of the House of Commons, John Berkow, made into a crossbench peer in the House of Lords. He has held a difficult post with courage through most challenging times, and his commitment should be recognised.
